snippet: The American Egg Board says it is planning a print and online advertising campaign featuring the actor Kevin Bacon and puns using his last name.
abstract: American Egg Board says it is planning print and online advertising campaign featuring actor Kevin Bacon and puns using his last name.
lead_paragraph: The American Egg Board says it is planning a print and online advertising campaign featuring the actor Kevin Bacon and puns using his last name.

headline.main: Kevin Bacon Joins Campaign to Sell Eggs Online and in Print
headline.print_headline: Kevin Bacon Joins Campaign to Sell Eggs Online and in Print
